Taunton.Theodore Dean House: The Theodore Dean House is a historic house located at 26 Dean Street in Taunton, Massachusetts. The 2-1/2 story Italianate style frame house features a central gable pavilion and a front porch carried on chamfered posts. It was built in 1866 for Theodore Dean, who was the last owner of the Taunton Iron Works and president of the Eagle Cotton Mill, and president of a local bank.
